content.title: New Career Pathways for Students
content.intro: Chaminade University and Pacific University partner to provide students with new opportunities to pursue careers in health professionsâ€¦

content.title: Healthcare with Cultural Sensitivity
content.intro: School of Nursing students provided health screenings and wellness education while learning how to be sensitive to Native Hawaiian culture.

content.title: A Night of Leadership Lessons and Networking
content.intro: The Hogan Entrepreneurs Kick-Off provided students the opportunity to meet business leaders and learn about 'spiritual confidence.'

content.title: The Show Goes On
content.intro: Showcasing their talents, the Pacific Islander Cultural clubs celebrated diversity through performances at the annual Pacific Island Review event.

content.title: 'All Things Marianist' Episodes 1 & 2
content.intro: As a way to highlight Marianists on campus, the Marianist Educational Associate are producing monthly videos to highlight Marianists at different levels.

content.title: 2018 Announcement
content.intro: Our premier early season basketball tournament features the strongest field in history.
